title: Cosmic Blade Yasuo instead of Battle Boss Yasuo

embed.title: Cosmic Blade Yasuo By Shenpaidoodles on Tumblr . . . . . #yasuo #skinconcept #leagueoflegends
embed.description: 5,997 Likes, 42 Comments - League of Legends (@legendary_champions) on Instagram: "Cosmic Blade Yasuo By Shenpaidoodles on Tumblr . . . . . #yasuo #skinconcept #leagueoflegends"

body:
I would like that Yasuo shall go in the Cosmic Theme and not in the Battle Boss Theme, it just doesnt fit, I also have a splashart, I also think that Yasuo fits in those like Demonish thingy u know ? Do you guys accept that too ? 
Here is the splash art : Cosmic Blade Yasuo
By Shenpaidoodles on Tumblr
